[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat Topology Filter

abbrev P2000AIMEII_15_answer : ℕ := sorry
theorem P2000AIMEII_15
: IsLeast {n : ℕ | 0 < n ∧ (∑ i in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 : ℝ) / (Real.cot (i * Real.pi / (n + 1)) - Real.cot (i * Real.pi / n))) = 1} P2000AIMEII_15_answer := by sorry. Enumerated answers: n  sum
